abstract: From the International Herald Tribune archives: Pope Paul VI urges a review of the Roman Catholic ban on birth control in 1965, to address overpopulation and family circumstances.

headline.main: 1965: Pope Seeks Urgent Review of Birth Control Ban

snippet: From the International Herald Tribune archives: Pope Paul VI urges a review of the Roman Catholic ban on birth control in 1965, to address overpopulation and family circumstances.
